title: Peli BioThermal Awarded EcoVadis Silver Medal in 2025 Sustainability Rating
description: MAPLE GROVE, Minn., Aug. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Peli BioThermal, a global leader in cold chain packaging for the life sciences and pharmaceutical supply chain, is proud to announce it has earned a Silver Medal rating
content:
MAPLE GROVE, Minn., Aug. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Peli BioThermal, a global leader in cold chain packaging for the life sciences and pharmaceutical supply chain, is proud to announce it has earned a Silver Medal rating from EcoVadis, the world's most trusted provider of business sustainability ratings. This achievement represents a major milestone in the company's sustainability journey, advancing from the Bronze rating received in 2024.

Committed to ambitious targets for our customers, communities, and the global environment.

The Silver Medal places Peli BioThermal among the top 15% of more than 125,000 companies assessed worldwide, underscoring measurable progress across four key areas: environmental impact, labor and human rights, ethics, and sustainable procurement.

"This recognition reflects our unwavering commitment to sustainable business practices across our global operations," said Barbara Zukrowska, ESG Director "We're proud to support the delivery of life-saving therapies—while helping protect the planet for future generations."

Key initiatives that contributed to the Silver rating include:

Peli BioThermal's sustainability strategy is guided by the principles of ISO 14001-certified environmental management systems and aligned with the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi), reinforcing the company's focus on data-driven climate action and continuous improvement — further aligning our business with internationally recognized environmental standards and our commitment to net-zero goals.

"We aim to create solutions that are both economically attractive and environmentally sound, ensuring our innovations drive fiscal and environmental sustainability in equal measure," added Sam Herbert, CEO. "This commitment is at the core of our mission, guiding the ambitious targets we set to meet our responsibilities to customers, communities, and the global environment."

Sustainability
Empowering Lives,
Protecting Our Planet,
Leading with Integrity
Sustainability is embedded in everything we do. As a leader in cold chain packaging, we are transforming the way life-saving medicines are transported while reducing CO2 emissions, minimizing waste, and ensuring ethical practices throughout our supply chain. Through science and innovation-based solutions, we are building a resilient future that delivers positive impact for both people and our planet.
Sustainability Benefits Everyone
Our packaging is designed to minimize waste, reduce emissions, and ensure your shipments are efficient and reliable, all while supporting a greener future. And this is just one way we deliver on our sustainability promise.
Foundation for a
Sustainable Future
To create a lasting impact, we have focused our sustainability efforts around the three key pillars of sustainability: Environmental, Social, and Governance. These pillars guide everything we do, ensuring that our actions today build a safer, more sustainable, and ethical future for all.
Environmental
Reducing Impact to Safeguard
Our Planet's Future
Our commitment to the environment goes beyond decarbonization. By reducing emissions, optimizing our supply chain, and adopting a circular economy approach, we are transforming our practices to protect the planet and achieve long-term carbon neutrality.
Social
Empowering People to Build
Stronger Communities
We prioritize the well-being of the communities we serve, from our employees to partners. By supporting local development, promoting ethical business practices, and driving inclusivity, we aim to empower people and create positive social change.
Governance
Leading with Integrity to Ensure
a More Ethical Supply Chain
We ensure the highest ethical standards across our operations through compliance with ISO14001, along with our Supplier Code of Conduct and specific policies that prioritize transparency and ethical behavior at every level.
Data-Driven Solutions for Sustainability Success
When it comes to achieving your sustainability goals, informed decisions lead to smarter outcomes. Peli BioThermal’s life cycle analysis (LCA), aligned with the GHG Protocol, empowers you to choose sustainable solutions that benefit both your business and the planet.

We believe that meaningful progress starts with a promise—to take responsibility for our impact, hold ourselves accountable, and work together with others to drive positive change. Our promise is built on three core commitments:
Taking Action
Every step we take is driven by our commitment to protecting the planet and the communities we serve. We are constantly innovating to reduce our environmental footprint, create life-saving solutions, and ensure that our products contribute to a better, more sustainable world.
Being Accountable
We hold ourselves to the highest standards of transparency and accountability. From regularly tracking and reporting on our progress to setting measurable goals, we ensure that our actions align with our values—and we’re not afraid to hold ourselves accountable when there’s more to be done.
In 2025, as we join the Science Based Targets initiative (SBTi), our near-term goals will focus on setting science-based emissions reduction targets to align with global climate goals. This commitment will drive us to evaluate and reduce our carbon footprint across all operations, from manufacturing to distribution. We’ll aim to integrate sustainability into every aspect of our business strategy, ensuring our cold chain solutions not only meet market demands but also contribute to a low-carbon future.

We know that true sustainability is a collaborative effort. That’s why we partner with communities, governments, non-profits, and industry leaders to multiply our impact. By working together, we can achieve more, fostering trust and building a network of shared commitment to a sustainable future.
